I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!

participant_2.background:
My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends.
i never learned how to drive.
I am a teacher who is engaged to a man that my family does not approve of
i like rollerblading.
I'm a single night owl who enjoys my work.

content.text: Hi! I'm really glad that you're taking a year off before college, it seems like a great idea. I'm a huge fan of Comic Con, what was your favorite part about it?

Hi! Thank you, it's been really nice to have some time to relax and catch up on some reading. My favorite part about Comic Con was definitely meeting all the amazing people who are so passionate about their fandoms. It was also really cool to see all the amazing cosplays.

That sounds so great! I'm so glad you had a good time. I've always wanted to go to Comic Con, but I've never been able to make it. I'm so impressed with the people who do the cosplays, they're always so creative.
It's definitely a lot of fun, I hope you can make it to one someday! And yeah, the cosplays are always incredible, I can't believe how much time and effort people put into them.
Me too! I'm always so impressed by how detailed they are.
What are some of your favorite fandoms?
I'm really into Marvel and Star Wars, but I also love a lot of anime and video games.
Oh, cool! I love Marvel and Star Wars too. I'm also a big fan of Harry Potter and Doctor Who.
Those are all great fandoms! I've never seen Doctor Who, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely check it out, it's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
